posts.post_content:
For sale are several 1912 T207 Brown Backgrounds.  Pricing includes shipping.   Let me know if you are interested. 

Thanks - John
 
 
 
Edward Ainsmith SGC 40  SOLD  -  some layering on top left and right corners. Centered towards bottom right

Hugh Bradley SGC 40  SOLD -  slightly creased, rounded corners and centered a bit towards the left

John Callahan SGC 50  SOLD - a few small ink stains on left border

Larry Doyle SGC 50   SOLD   - 1912 NL MVP,  soft/rounded corners, and centered towards the right of the border

Louis Evans SGC 60  SOLD - well-centered card, rounded corners

John  Ferry SGC 60  SOLD - Slightly torn top left and right edges, and slight creasing on bottom right edge


[IMG]http://www.lelands.com/public/Auctionimages/0/52/52443/63049a.jpg[/IMG]
I'll take the Ainsmith.  Email sent.
